result.arabic_text: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
result.translation: 1. A-korosey Yallih Amri (Qhiyaamah Ayro kinnuk) yemeeteeh, xayyooweh, tokkel Nabii sin kah xagnise digaalat maasassakina, agleh kaat hayya haanamak Yalli saytunnooweeh fay ya iyyek.
